vote.text: Amendment SA 2733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2733 proposed by Senator Boozman. (consideration: CR S7928; text: CR S7928) To amend the resolving clause.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2733 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
